title: Laura Meseguer
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053557/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053557/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Laura Meseguer**

Designer of the Rumba type family and several fonts for [Type-Ø-Tones](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809053557/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type-O-Tones).
